Correction: A case of a patient with ischemic cardiomyopathy in a single coronary artery treated using directional coronary atherectomy without coronary stenting
Yasuki Omori1 · Ryo Nishio1 · Ryo Takeshige1 · Makito Ozawa1 · Daisuke Matsumoto1 · Hiroshi Takaishi1
Published online: 24 August 2023 © The Author(s) under exclusive licence to Japanese Association of Cardiovascular Intervention and Therapeutics 2023

sections.heading: Correction: Cardiovascular Intervention and
sections.text:
Therapeutics https://doi.org/10.1007/s12928-023-00946-7
In the original version of this article, the given name of Yasuki Omori was incorrectly published. The correct name is given in this correction. The original article has been corrected.
Publisher's Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s12928- 023- 00946-7.

1 Department of Cardiovascular Medicine, Yodogawa Christian Hospital, 1-7-50 Kunijima Higashiyodogawa-Ku, Osaka-City, Osaka, Japan

title: Correction: A case of a patient with ischemic cardiomyopathy in a single coronary artery treated using directional coronary atherectomy without coronary stenting
